problem_summary_simple: Find the number of unique Morse code transformations for a list of words.
problem_summary_technical: Map each word to its Morse code representation and store unique transformations in a set.
time_complexity: O(n), where n is the sum of all word lengths
key_insights: The problem requires converting each word into its Morse code equivalent.
A set is the ideal data structure to automatically handle uniqueness of the resulting Morse code strings.
The mapping from letters to Morse code can be pre-defined in a list or dictionary.
